description:
A neat established canyon emptying into to Horseshoe bend.

Approach

Use Dirt Road at 36.88926, -111.49369, not the horseshoe bend lot.

Descent

Bolted Anchors or Pitons present for most drops.

A 200ft rope will complete this route.

Several of the shorter drops can be downclimbed and multiple anchors are present for several sequences.

Exit

Packraft to Lees Ferry

Red tape

Be mindful of attention from horseshoe bend.

Beta sites

Trip reports and media

Background
name: 9 Mile Draw
